content: this highly detailed and illustrated crochet pattern will take through every step to make a gorgeous crochet cloud pillow perfect addition to a little bubs nursery pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology this listing is for an instant pdf download for the crochet cloud pillow pattern is made using two skeins of 8 ply acrylic yarn and requires a 5 75mm hook pillow is filled with hobby fill or a polyfibre filling final pillow measures 31 cm high and 50cm wide skill level - beginner/easy to work this pattern you need to know how to - single_crochet and half_double_crochet hdc2tog this listing is not a finished product you will not receive a finished pillow if you buy this listing there will be no refund for purchases made in error unless the item has not yet been downloaded all of our patterns includes many pictures gauge abbreviation keys stitch counts and extra notes to help explain if you have any questions about the pattern please feel free to contact us -----------instant download link will be emailed to you once payment has cleared--------------- the pattern and photographs contained in this document are property of peach&paige this pattern is available for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is allowed you are welcome to sell the finished product with credit to the pattern please follow peach&paige on instagram and facebook facebook com/peachandpaige instagram com/peachandpaige
